eve.label: Epic arcs guide
eve.content: In depth guide for EVE Online level 4 epic arc missions. Find all about the related missions, enemies, rewards, what to bring and how to start them...

x4.label: Map
x4.content: Complete X4 map, together with X4 Split Vendetta and Cradle of Humanity systems (v4.1).

x4.label: Resources
x4.content: Supplement table to X4 map, gives table overview of resources available in the game.

x4.label: Ships
x4.content: List of ships with their stats. Still work in progress with aim at offering same equiping options as in game so that you can use this application to validate your fits beforehand.

x4.label: Efficiency
x4.content: Analysis of trading ships currently in X4 Foundations version 3.3.
